rooms.description: A large open space serving as the entrance and main living area with traditional Chettinad motifs and ample natural light.
Adjacent to the living room for a comfortable dining experience, incorporating Vastu principles for social interaction.
Functional kitchen space with storage and workspace, ensuring efficient movement as per local norms.
A separate bedroom for guests designed with a balcony for relaxation and fresh air, adhering to Vastu guidelines on guest flow.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and Vastu alignment.
Additional bedroom offering ample space for personal use, also featuring its own balcony as per design.
Shared balcony area connecting both bedrooms and living spaces; designed in keeping with Chettinad aesthetics.
